沑字的基本解释

沑
nǜ
〔蹜（
泥。s?）沑〕水纹聚。

沑
niǔ
湿。

沑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nǜ］
［《廣韻》女六切，入屋，娘。］
水纹。《文选·木华〈海赋〉》：“驚浪雷奔，駭水迸集。開合解會，瀼瀼濕濕。葩華踧沑。”李善注：“踧沑，蹵聚也。”清钱大昕《答问八》：“《廣韻》：'蹜沑，水文聚。'於《易》，物相雜爲文，凡丑之字粈……則沑爲水文審矣。”一说，水流疾。见《说文·水部》“沑”清段玉裁注。

沑字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　沑； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页611第08
【唐韻】人九切【集韻】忍九切，?音蹂。【說文】水利也。一曰溫也。　又【集韻】女九切，音紐。濕也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?女六切，音恧。縮沑，水文蹙聚。【木華·海賦】葩華踧沑。

沑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
沑字的起名意思

暂无。

mud. s?) 沑〕Water pattern poly.
Squeeze

Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [nǜ]
["Guangyun" female six cuts, enter the house, mother. ]
Water pattern. "Wenxuan·Muhua": "Thunderstorms and thunderstorms, horrified water bursts together. Opening and closing meetings, 瀼瀼wet and damp. Po Hua 渧沑." Li Shan's note: "Zhu 沑, 貵絵 also. "Qingqian Daxin "Answer 8": ""Guangyun":'Yu pau, hydrology gathering.' In "Yi", the material phase is mixed, and the ugly word is...then it is the hydrological review. "One said, the water is ill. See "Fu" Qing Duan Yucai's Note in "Shuowen·Shuibu".
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　沑; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 611 08
[Tang Yun] Nine cuts for people [Jiyun] Nine cuts for endurance, sound ravaged. [Said the text] Water conservancy also. One said warm.　[Jiyun] Female nine cuts, sound button. Wet too.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Female six cuts, sound. Shrinking, hydrology floppy. 【Muhua·Haifu】Ping Hua Zou.
